author: imario
msg: Now it should be possible to use VFS's singleton pattern safely in an multithreaded environment.
Though VFS do not deal with locking or transaction. This is something a LockManager or TransactionManager has todo.

author: imario
msg: Thanks to Tomas Blohm for reporting it.

author: imario
msg: CompositeFileProvider: implementation TgzFileProvider & Tbz2FileProvider - not used yet - for performance reasons the TarFileProvider handles the decompression too.
